ygData.subject: Re: MEGATRON"S PLAN
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine hears a second explosion By the matrix, I m to late One moment Ramhorns asking for assistance, the next theres a boom at the ark. Lunarpine stayed

Lunarpine hears a second explosion "By the matrix, I'm to late" One 
moment Ramhorns asking for assistance, the next theres a boom at the 
ark. Lunarpine stayed at the Ark and because he ran off in a fit he 
wasn't here when his senses were needed most."Ark, respond, what's 
fragging going on there?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramhorn::
> 
> Ramhorn's eyes widen as he realizes he's still alive. He had 
thought the 
> blast would have killed them both. Whatever had stopped the blast 
however, 
> had reversed their deaths.
> 
> He looks at Megatron. "Not so fast!"
> 
> "Total system shutdown."
> 
> With that command, everything in the Ark went out, all the power 
shutting 
> off. Ramhorn looks back at Megatron, once again firing at him.
> 
> "This is Ramhorn," he says into his comm-link while firing, "I 
might need 
> some reinforcement at the Ark."
